question: What is the new-born mortality rate of India, as per the Sample Registration System (SRS), 2018?
explanation:
As per the Sample Registration System (SRS), 2018, which is the recent edition, India at a new-born mortality rate of 23 per 1,000 live births.
Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan released a detailed progress card on India New-born Action Plan (INAP) targets. National New-born Week being observed from November 15 to 21 on the theme of 'Quality, equity, dignity for every new-born at every health facility and everywhere'.
